errors.unrecognized: ${var} is not recognized by this bot as a valid argument.
errors.too_many_args: You entered too many arguments. Please retry. Keep in mind you need double quotes (") to send lobot to a voice channel you're not in.
errors.must_in_vc: You must be in a join channel to execute this command. Please join one and try again.
errors.not_permissions: You do not have enough permissions to run this command. Please contact one of the bot's administrator such as <@!${var}>
